Hero.title: The Cruel Age. Isai Kalashnikov
Hero.desc: The historical novel 'The Cruel Age' is a vivid depiction of the lives of the Mongols in the late 12th and early 13th centuries. Lightning-fast steppe crossings, the smoke of nomadic camps, and an unrestrained free life where mortal danger and fortune are inseparable... The army of the brilliant commander and monster, Genghis Khan, swept away all life in its path like fiery volcanic lava: exterminating tribes and peoples, reducing flourishing civilizations to ashes. Genghis Khan's desire, as the orchestrator of this cruel absurdity, to become the sole ruler of the Universe drove him to new and ever more bloody conquestsâ€¦
